issue.title: [Integration] Re-enable disabled Rust Flight middleware test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17385](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17385). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up for ARROW-10961. The linked Rust issue was fixed, so we should re-enable the integration test case.
